name: Maldives Resort
summary: Luxury beach paradise with crystal clear waters and overwater bungalows
itinerary: Day 1-2: Arrival and beach relaxation. Day 3-4: Snorkeling and spa. Day 5: Water sports and sunset cruise

name: Nepal Trekking
summary: Adventure through the Himalayas with breathtaking mountain views
itinerary: Day 1-2: Kathmandu exploration. Day 3-7: Annapurna Base Camp trek. Day 8: Return and celebration

name: Kyoto Cultural Tour
summary: Immerse yourself in Japanese culture, temples, and traditional experiences
itinerary: Day 1-2: Temple visits. Day 3: Tea ceremony and kimono experience. Day 4-5: Historic districts and gardens

name: Swiss Alps Retreat
summary: Cozy mountain getaway with skiing and alpine charm
itinerary: Day 1-3: Skiing and snowboarding. Day 4: Mountain village exploration. Day 5: Spa and relaxation

name: Iceland Adventure
summary: Extreme adventure with glaciers, volcanoes, and northern lights
itinerary: Day 1-2: Golden Circle tour. Day 3-4: Glacier hiking. Day 5: Ice cave exploration. Day 6: Northern lights hunt

name: Morocco Cultural Journey
summary: Explore vibrant markets, ancient medinas, and desert landscapes
itinerary: Day 1-2: Marrakech souks. Day 3-4: Sahara desert camp. Day 5: Fes cultural sites

name: Caribbean Wellness Circuit
summary: Island-hopping wellness journey with yoga, thermal baths, and curated nutrition
itinerary: Day 1: Aruba beach yoga. Day 2: Curacao thermal springs. Day 3: St. Lucia rainforest meditation. Day 4-5: Private catamaran reset

name: Bali Surf & Spa Escape
summary: Blend gentle reef breaks with hillside spa rituals and cultural evenings
itinerary: Day 1: Uluwatu surf coaching. Day 2: Spa and herbal workshop. Day 3: Rice terrace cycle. Day 4-5: Seminyak sunsets and cafe hopping

name: Nordic Fjord Slow Cruise
summary: Polar-view cruising focused on mindfulness decks, onboard lectures, and quiet fjord landings
itinerary: Day 1: Oslo embarkation. Day 2: Geirangerfjord mindfulness hike. Day 3: Trondheim culture hour. Day 4-5: Lofoten sauna ritual

name: Costa Rica Eco Quest
summary: Rainforest zip-lines, gentle rafting, and wildlife immersion with certified naturalists
itinerary: Day 1: Arenal canopy walk. Day 2: Class II rafting. Day 3: Sloth sanctuary. Day 4: Cloud forest night tour. Day 5: Pacific sunset paddle

name: Canadian Rockies Multi-Sport
summary: Mix alpine hikes, glacier kayaking, and via ferrata routes across Banff and Jasper
itinerary: Day 1: Banff ridge hike. Day 2: Moraine Lake kayak. Day 3: Columbia Icefield trek. Day 4: Via ferrata. Day 5: Hot springs recovery

name: Kamchatka Volcano Traverse
summary: Heli-assisted drop-offs, lava field trekking, and glacier camping on Russia's Pacific rim
itinerary: Day 1: Petropavlovsk briefing. Day 2-3: Mutnovsky ascent. Day 4: Tolbachik lava tubes. Day 5: Coastal hot springs

name: Imperial Capitals Grand Tour
summary: Guided art immersions across Vienna, Prague, and Budapest with slow travel pacing
itinerary: Day 1: Vienna palaces. Day 2: Classical concert. Day 3: Prague walking salons. Day 4: Budapest thermal baths. Day 5: Danube sunset cruise

name: Peruvian Living History Loop
summary: Community-led Andes homestays, culinary labs, and train journeys to Machu Picchu
itinerary: Day 1: Cusco walking seminar. Day 2: Sacred Valley weaving. Day 3: Machu Picchu sunrise. Day 4: Lake Titicaca homestay. Day 5: Lima food lab

name: Silk Road Frontier Expedition
summary: Overland convoy through Kyrgyzstan and Uzbekistan with remote fort explorations
itinerary: Day 1: Bishkek bazaar. Day 2: Song-Kol yurt camp. Day 3: Pamir Highway jeep. Day 4: Samarkand ruins. Day 5: Bukhara night market

name: Mediterranean Yacht Collective
summary: Crewed catamaran sharing gourmet deck dinners, freediving clinics, and artisan island hops
itinerary: Day 1: Athens chef tasting. Day 2: Cyclades swim coves. Day 3: Serifos freedive coaching. Day 4: Milos wine cave. Day 5: Hydra sunset sail

name: Andalusian Flamenco Trail
summary: Tapas tutorials, flamenco masterclasses, and heritage hotel stays across southern Spain
itinerary: Day 1: Seville barrio immersion. Day 2: Flamenco workshop. Day 3: Cordoba patios. Day 4: Granada Alhambra. Day 5: Sherry cellar finale

name: Sahara Ultra Trek
summary: Fast-paced desert endurance trek with dune bivouacs and cambered fat-bike stages
itinerary: Day 1: Merzouga acclimation. Day 2: Erg Chebbi trek. Day 3: Night bivouac. Day 4: Fat-bike dash. Day 5: Oasis recovery

name: Tokyo Future Lab Stay
summary: Stay in design-forward micro hotels with robotics tours, anime studios, and foodie alleys
itinerary: Day 1: Akihabara tech crawl. Day 2: Robotics lab. Day 3: Tsukiji tasting. Day 4: Studio Ghibli stops. Day 5: Night skyline cruise

name: Alaskan Aurora Ski Camp
summary: Backcountry ski touring with avalanche-certified guides and nightly aurora domes
itinerary: Day 1: Anchorage prep. Day 2: Heli drop glacier tour. Day 3: Avalanche skills. Day 4: Night aurora watch. Day 5: Ice climbing intro

name: Vietnam Mekong Slowboat
summary: Slowboat journey with floating markets, farm-to-table lunches, and local homestays
itinerary: Day 1: Ho Chi Minh culinary tour. Day 2: Cai Be floating market. Day 3: Homestay cooking. Day 4: Cycling delta paths. Day 5: Spa finale
